data.lyric:
[ti:All I Want]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:High School Musical: The Musical: The Series (Original Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]All I Want (From "High School Musical: The Musical: The Series") - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:03.79]Lyrics by：Olivia Rodrigo
[00:07.59]Composed by：Olivia Rodrigo
[00:11.39]I found a guy told me I was a star
[00:17.12]He held the door held my hand in the dark
[00:22.10]And he's perfect on paper but he's lying to my face
[00:28.24]Does he think that I'm the
[00:30.10]Kinda girl who needs to be saved
[00:40.30]And there's one more boy he's from my past
[00:45.95]We fell in love but it didn't last
[00:51.18]'Cause the second I figure it out he pushes me away
[00:57.20]And I won't fight for love if you won't meet me halfway
[01:03.76]And I say that I'm through but this song's still for you
[01:10.87]All I want is love that lasts
[01:13.60]Is all I want too much to ask
[01:17.00]Is it something wrong with me
[01:22.88]All I want is a good guy
[01:25.53]Are my expectations far too high
[01:29.02]Try my best but what can I say
[01:31.37]All I have is myself at the end of the day
[01:37.07]But shouldn't that be enough for me
[01:46.14]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:51.63]And I miss the days when I was young and naive
[01:57.03]I thought the perfect guy would come and find me
[02:02.44]Now happy ever after it don't come so easily
[02:11.17]All I want is love that lasts
[02:13.96]Is all I want too much to ask
[02:17.40]Is it something wrong with me oh ooh
[02:23.28]All I want is a good guy
[02:25.97]Are my expectations far too high
[02:29.38]Try my best but what can I say
[02:31.72]All I have is myself at the end of the day
[02:37.07]And all I want is for that to be okay
data.trans:
[ti:All I Want]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:High School Musical: The Musical: The Series (Original Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.79]//
[00:07.59]//
[00:11.39]我遇到一个男人 他对我说 我是一颗星
[00:17.12]他会为我扶着门 在黑暗中 拉着我的手
[00:22.10]他表面上完美无暇 却当着我的面撒谎
[00:28.24]他是不是以为我是那种
[00:30.10]需要被拯救的女孩
[00:40.30]还有一个男孩 他已成为我的过去
[00:45.95]我们曾经是恋人 但没能走到最后
[00:51.18]因为在我刚想明白的时候 他就把我推开
[00:57.20]如果你不肯为我让步 我也不会为爱而战
[01:03.76]我说我受够了 但这首歌依然是为了你
[01:10.87]我想要的全部 就是长长久久的爱
[01:13.60]这点要求过分吗
[01:17.00]是我哪里不对吗
[01:22.88]我想要的全部 就是一个好男人
[01:25.53]我的期望太高了吗
[01:29.02]尽我所能 但我能说什么
[01:31.37]到了最后 我只有我自己
[01:37.07]但那对我来说还不够吗
[01:46.14]//
[01:51.63]我怀念那些年少无知的日子
[01:57.03]我以为 完美的男人会来到我面前
[02:02.44]现在看来 美好结局确实来之不易
[02:11.17]我想要的全部 就是长长久久的爱
[02:13.96]这点要求过分吗
[02:17.40]是我哪里不对吗
[02:23.28]我想要的全部 就是一个好男人
[02:25.97]我的期望太高了吗
[02:29.38]尽我所能 但我能说什么
[02:31.72]到了最后 我只有我自己
[02:37.07]我只想让一切都好起来
